name: zed2native-ide
description: Jump to Xcode (xed) or Android Studio (studio) at the current file and line.

zed2native-ide:jump-to-xcode.title: Jump to Xcode
zed2native-ide:jump-to-xcode.description: Open current file in Xcode at the current line

zed2native-ide:jump-to-android-studio.title: Jump to Android Studio
zed2native-ide:jump-to-android-studio.description: Open current file in Android Studio at the current line

zed2native-ide:auto-jump.title: Auto Jump to Native IDE
zed2native-ide:auto-jump.description: Automatically jump to Xcode or Android Studio based on file type
